Title: WireGuard Portal v2 Vulnerable to OAuth Insecure Redirect URI / Account Takeover
Description: Users of WireGuard Portal v2 who have OAuth (or OIDC) authentication backends enabled can be affected by an Account Takeover vulnerability if they visit a malicious website.
NotImpacted: All versions before 2.0.0-alpha.1, all versions starting from 2.0.0-alpha.3
